settings.title: GROWN HERE. MADE HERE.
settings.text:
From our farm to your home — we're growing the best upland cotton that the rich red earth of North Alabama can produce to bring you luxury linens that are fresh from the farm. Our American made cotton bed sheets and towels are created with the cotton grown on our family farm, which creates a farm to home difference we take pride in. Discover the Red Land Cotton difference for yourself with our signature soft, durable, and ever comfortable bedding and bath towels. Our luxury linens are available in various patterns and styles that feature classic, timeless, and heirloom inspired designs.

Our American-made pure cotton bedding, bed sheets, and bath towels are proudly made in the USA and crafted exclusively with cotton sourced directly from our North Alabama farm.

settings.title: Testimonials
settings.testimonial_1:
Love everything behind this company. So happy to see someone making a great product right here in the USA.
The material is crisp and strong and a good hefty weight. Am thinking it will last a long time. Doesn't wrinkle too badly and the sheets just plain feel great in bed and the shifts are a good design. Love this company!!

settings.subtitle: quality from the ground up
settings.title: Grown Here.
settings.text: Our cotton is grown by our family in North Alabama. From the seed in the ground to the final stitch sewn, every piece of Red Land Cotton is made right here in the USA. You can trust that the cotton used in our products is grown via strict US regulations and sustainable farming practices. We live on our farm and want only the best for our children and the environment.

settings.subtitle: american made
settings.title: no compromising.
settings.text: every piece of Red Land Cotton is made right here in America. we don't do what is easy, we do what is right.

settings.subtitle: different by design
settings.title: heirloom inspired.
settings.text: all of our products are inspired by timeless style, heirloom quality and a time when things were made right.

settings.title: The Go Anywhere Dress
settings.subheading: available in 3/4 length sleeve and sleeveless

settings.title: A Timeless Dress Crafted By Artisans in Alabama.
settings.text: The Go Anywhere Dress is designed with our signature American cotton percale fabric for a breathable, crisp, and versatile feel. This is a favorite throw-on dress to grab a coffee or lounge by the pool. You can pair it with leggings, belt it, or throw it over your swimsuit for a relaxed coverup. Our 3/4 length sleeve features a classic collar and a deep V neckline, or our Sleeveless option features a mandarin collar—choose your style!

settings.subtitle: customer appreciation
settings.title: 3/4  length sleeve
settings.text: "Amazed at the feel of this shirt! So nice to lounge in our wear with your cutest capris." - Carla Y.

settings.title: Truly versatile
settings.text: Our Go-Anywhere Dresses are ideal for sleeping or daily wear, has pockets for your hands (or phone!), and can easily be worn all day in multiple styles. Wear this throw-on dress over jeans with flats for buzzing around or a simple swim cover-up.

settings.subtitle: customer appreciation
settings.title: Sleeveless
settings.text: "I love this dress! It’s perfect for the warmer weather and the look is simple and chic!" - Kelly A.

settings.title: All-American Blanket Collection
settings.subheading: grown in alabama. made in maine.

settings.title: Follow our guide
settings.text:
Follow our guide to make your bed a source of comfort and warmth.

Step 1: Color:
Keep your color choices neutral to promote a sense of calm and tranquility in your space.

Step 2: Create Height By Layering Pillows:
Use European-sized pillows in the back of the bed, followed by standard or king-size shams in a matte texture.

Step 3: Beginning & Ending with Texture:
Choosing shams with a bit of texture invites the eye upward. At the end of your bed, use a folded throw or a quilt with the same pattern, texture, or color as you used in your European shams. This will compliment your shams and tie the look together.

Step 4: Layers of Warmth:
Style optional layers at the bottom of your bed that can be removed or pulled up depending on your sleep preferences.

Check out our fall sheets, pillows, and textures below to find the perfect style for you!

settings.subheading: “I gave this as a Christmas gift to my friend in California and she loved it!  She is so happy to have a slice of  Southern charm in her kitchen.” - Karla B

“We received a set of the sheets as a Christmas gift, and we absolutely love them. They are so soft and well made with generous proportions. We loved them so much, we ordered a set to give as a gift. They are a great product with a great story behind them. We are so proud to have such a wonderful company right here in Alabama!” - Denise J.
